duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform IV Insertion and phlebotomy procedures as required.
Administer conscious sedation to patients as per the physician's orders.
Adhere to patient care standards and protocols to ensure high-quality care delivery.
Provide nursing care to patients with various conditions and ensure their comfort and well-being.
Ensure accurate documentation of patient information and treatment plans.
Work alternating weekends and possible holidays, and float to other departments as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Associate's Degree in Nursing (Bachelor's Degree preferred)
